parameter.name: REAMSViewLOCALConnectionString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: REAMSViewLOCALConnectionString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: AppCoreLOCALConnectionString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: AppCoreLOCALConnectionString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: REAMSViewDEV-Web.config Connection String
